headline: AMETEK Increases Quarterly Dividend
summary: AMETEK, Inc. (NYSE: AME) today announced its Board of Directors has approved a 10% increase in its quarterly cash dividend on common stock to $0.34 per share from $0.31 per share. The first quarter dividend is payable March 31, 2026 to shareholders of record as of March 16, 2026. This dividend increase will raise the indicated annual rate to $1.36 per share.

headline: 2 Unpopular Stocks That Should Get More Attention and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
